mapper.insert: insert BoardComment(board_num,writer,contents,grp) values (#{board_num},#{writer},#{contents}, (select if(isnull(max(grp)),1,max(grp)+1) as grp from about_time.BoardComment ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY where board_num = #{board_num}))

insert BoardComment(board_num,writer,contents,target,grp,seq) values (#{board_num},#{writer},#{contents},${target}, (select if(isnull(max(grp)),1,max(grp)+1) as grp from BoardComment ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY where board_num = #{board_num}), (select if(isnull(max(seq)),1,max(seq)+1) as seq from BoardComment ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY where board_num = #{board_num} and grp = #{grp}));
mapper.select: select * from BoardComment where board_num=#{board_num} order by grp asc, seq asc
